org.infogrid.comm

Class AbstractWaitingEndpoint<T extends CarriesInvocationId>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.infogrid.comm.AbstractWaitingEndpoint<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the message type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    MessageEndpointListener<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ReturnSynchronizerEndpoint, WaitForResponseEndpoint

    public abstract class AbstractWaitingEndpoint<T extends CarriesInvocationId>
extends java.lang.Object
implements MessageEndpointListener<T>
    Factors out functionality common to communications endpoint that wait for responses.

      • createInvocationId

        protected long createInvocationId()
        Overridable helper to create unique invocation IDs. Note that these invocation IDs must be unique, even if the endpoint is temporarily suspended, saved on disk etc. because ongoing communications with the partner may otherwise become ambiguous. By default, we use the current time as an invocation ID.
        Returns:
        the invocation identifier
